reviews.review:
Do not waste your money on this game. The devs have made it very clear with the last few patches that they care far more about selling cosmetics then the function of the game. They consider 150ms of latency to be good enough for their dedicated servers, the game has constant balance issues, and bugs stay in the game for months before being fixed. 

This game has such a strong core concept but it seems as time goes on it becomes far less fun to play. If you want a casual game to play, this is not the one for you. If you love being frustrated by many latency based bugs, i can highly recommend this game. I want to love this game, but the last years worth of DLC and updates have burned me out.

Observação: Bom após ter jogado +400 de jogo, é claramente nítido que o jogo é muito bom ( pra mim no caso ) todo o sistema de jogo é divertido e viciante, mas infelizmente o jogo apresenta alguns bugs que podem incomodar, . De qualquer jeito recomendo esse jogo pra quem procura um jogo de terror multiplayer
yay

This game forces you to fall into a veritable dark night of the soul where you have two choices on how to continue: either embrace zen and non-duality, or continue suffering at the mercy of a pendulum that swings between manic pleasure and misery.

In other words: you're better off playing anything else. Play Civ 5. Play Minecraft. Play Hunniepop. Anything else.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Edit: Seriously though, it's a great game, and has the potential to be even more amazing. But it makes me very disappointed how key devs view their own game and their players. They are shockingly out of touch with how their own game actually plays. You can look up interviews where they hold their own player base in disdain or mock them while making excuses for broken mechanics and poor game design choices that should be fixed if they take their jobs at all seriously. The spaghetti code here and consequences of it is real.

O jogo é bom, tem muitos bugs e problemas com balanceamento mas a empresa está trabalhando para melhorar o jogo por isso minha análise é positiva, acredito que eles estão dedicados a corrigir os erros que eles cometeram, é muito bom pra jogar com amigos, a experiência solo é bem cansativa e jogar como assassino pode ser uma opção divertida se o objetivo não for ganhar ou seja matar os 4 sobreviventes.
The game is good cause they finally fixed vaults lol. They also seem to be putting more effort in the killers and survivors bringing in new ideas which creates for awesome gameplay.

Edit July 2022 - 

Killers are now playing worse than before - it was never hard to play killer but its now almost impossible as a surivour, especially solo queue. This game is turned into something awful now and I truly no longer want to experience it.

---------------------------------

Honestly, this game just isn't very fun anymore. The changes that have been made have ruined the feeling of the game. To a point where it isn't something I want to hit play on unless I'm with friends who can help make the experience worth having a laugh at. It's a shame really, spent so many hours in this game and nowadays, I just don't want to play it without friends just to make the experience worth going through.

Dont get me wrong, you can have a proper laugh with friends but alone, solo survivour, its just tedious

Currently getting through two games is painful and its not going to change. BHVR say they play this game, and it clearly shows they only play it within their own company - which if you watch their streams shows they really dont play the game at all... Theyre trash.

Místo přidávání nějakých zbytečných kostýmů, nových dlc apod. by se vývojáři mohli konečně vrhnout na řešení těch zabijáků zábavy: hitboxy (hraji za survivora, řvu nasráním - hraji za killera, je mi těch lidí líto), matchmaking (hlavně pro killery) a balanc některých perků.

Pokud se tyto problémy vyřeší, tak tuto hru směle doporučuji, je to pěkný žrout času (a pro mnohé i peněz).

jogo mtt bom

Esse jogo é muito bom, tem uma promissa (ideia) boa, com o crossover de vários astros dos clássicos filmes de terror como Halloween, A Hora do Pesadelo, O Massacre da Serra Elétrica, Jogos Mortais, Uma noite alucinante, Pânico e a série Stranger Things. Enfim, tem muita história e um modo de jogo (propósito) excelente, mas que fique dado o recado, o gerenciamento da empresa é horrível pois o jogo ainda contém inúmeros problemas de jogabilidade como "bugs" e "hitboxes" sem contar no comportamento dos killers, entretanto, vai de cada um, no meu caso, as qualidades se sobressaem sobre os defeitos, por isso recomendo. E tbm... PRETTY GOOD JOB SO FAR....
best game ever

Ужасная игра!!! Постоянно какие то ошибки, лаги, глюки. Сервера лагают, хит боксы не понятно как работают, ман может ударить вас даже стоя к вам спиной, отбежав от окна когда бежите от мана это не гарантирует вам безопасность но гарантирует через 10 секунд получить хит от воздуха, зачем нужны палетки если ман пробивает через них, постоянно что то делают с балансом. От игры хочется блевать. Когда сижу в туалете и думаю о ДБД начинается кровавый понос и рвота желчью. Это игра убьёт вашу психику и вы во время сна можете придушить хомяка. Как вспоню хит через окно аж бесит. Если ты челове без достоинства и самоуважения то эта игра именно для вас. Вас будут токсить оскорблять, может быть возжелают иметь интимную близость с вашими родственниками просто за то что вы убежали или повесили всех!!!!! Я НЕ ХОЧУ БОЛЬШЕ В ЭТОМ УЧАВСТВОВАТЬ !!! РАЗРАБОТЧИКИ СДЕЛАЙТЕ НОРМАЛЬНУЮ ИГРУ ХВАТИТ ЗАНИМАЕТСЯ ИЗНАСИЛОВАНИЕМ ДЕТСКИХ МОЗГОВ. Вы же не педофилы ?

Геймплей убийц  4/5, есть небольшие проблемы с балансом в игре. Геймплей соло выжившего  3/5, довольно скучно чинить генераторы с другой стороны вас никто не заставит это делать (но осудят, хотя кому какое дело) старайтесь играть соло в свое удовольствие. Главное что разрабы пилят контент, практически каждое ДЛС довольно интересное.
